page.title: 09THE PEOPLE OF OFFLEY, contd.
page.content: and catch the train, 7% use vans and 7% use motor bikes. 12% walk to work. 81% of the population of this area have moved here during their lifetime; 60% of these have moved in from nearby e.g. from Lilley, Luton, Cockernhoe; 40% of them have come from further afield. eg. Norfolk, Surrey and Yorkshire. 33% of the residents are landowners and 67% rent their land. 39% of the residents own their houses and 61% rent theirs. Every house has all the basic amenities. The vast majority of people enjoy living in Offley. 2.5% did not like Offley, 2.5% sometimes enjoyed living in Offley.
